Today, Dan and Jordan enter Part 3 of their coverage of Alex Jones' 2009 "documentary" [[The Obama Deception]]. In this installment, we see Alex completely blow it with list-making, misrepresent some history, and make a few decent points for the completely wrong reasons.

==Tidbits==

*[[Barack Obama|Obama]]'s picks are designed to bring down the government
*Alex names Bilderberg members in cabinet but is almost completely wrong
*Tarpley claims Obama was groomed for 30 years to be President
*Discussion: Tarpley et al are purposely ignoring the facts
*Obama came from nowhere, but still was speaking out after 9/11
*Discussion: Obama's comments on getting out of Iraq in 16 months
*Samantha Power Hard Talk interview
*[[Jesse Ventura]] says Obama can't get us out of Iraq because more powerful people got us in
*Discussion: Obama encircling Russia
*Tarpley says Soros runs Obama, only Soros reference in the documentary
*Discussion: Obama and the Patriot Act
*Discussion: Obama and NAFTA comments
*Discussion: Futility of going against bad faith arguments
*Discussion: EO 13492 and Guantanamo
*Discussion: Incremental change
*In the interest of time, we can't cover all of Obama's lies
*Obama's lobbyist picks
*Discussion: [[Tom Daschle]]
*Discussion: Prove me wrong
*Cliffhanger: [[Wayne Paul]]
